name: smart-forms
description: Smart Forms is a library for creating dynamic forms in React. It allows you to define forms using JSON schema and renders them automatically. It also supports validation, conditional fields, and custom components.

_comments.dev: Run both apps in dev mode (static on 3000, dynamic on 3001)
_comments.build: Build both apps (static‑site will also export)
_comments.debug: Same as dev, but launch the dynamic app with the Node inspector
_comments.export: Export just the static site (alias for static‑site build)
_comments.start: Start both built apps (static on 3000, dynamic on 3001)

scripts.dev: npm --workspace=packages/static-site run dev & npm --workspace=packages/dynamic-app run dev -- -p 3001 & npm --workspace=packages/backend-services run dev
scripts.debug: npm --workspace=packages/static-site run dev & DEBUG=next-auth:* NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' npm --workspace=packages/dynamic-app run dev -- -p 3001
scripts.build: npm --workspace=packages/lib-db run build && npm --workspace=packages/static-site run build && npm --workspace=packages/dynamic-app run build & npm --workspace=packages/backend-services run build & npm --workspace=packages/lib-middleware run build
scripts.start: npm --workspace=packages/static-site run start -- -p 3000 & npm --workspace=packages/dynamic-app run start -- -p 3001 & npm --workspace=packages/backend-services run start
